ftbquests.task.questeventbridge.trade_ta: Complete by trading with villagers that match the filters.
qeb.task.trade.required.tooltip: How many trades are needed to complete the task.
qeb.task.trade.use_total.tooltip: If True, counts all villager trades (ignores profession filter).
qeb.task.trade.use_dropdown.tooltip: If True, use the dropdown value. If disabled, use the manual field.
qeb.task.trade.profession_dropdown.toolt: Pick a profession ID from registered villager professions.
qeb.task.trade.profession_manual.tooltip: Type a profession ID like minecraft:librarian or mayview:librarian.
qeb.task.trade.use_wanted_item.tooltip: If True, use the Trade Wanted Item
qeb.task.trade.wanted_item.tooltip: Item ID of the wanted trade item
qeb.task.trade.wanted_is_input.tooltip: If True, Use the Trade Input(Trade CostA/CostB) for Task.  If False, Use the Trade Output(Result) for Task
qeb.task.trade.use_wanted_item_count.too: If True, Use Sum of (Wanted Item) for (Trade/Item Count)
